metadata.title: CVE-2021-45474 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In MediaWiki through 1.37, the Special:ImportFile URI (aka FileImporter)allows XSS, as demonstrated by the clientUrl parameter.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
